document.full_text: after a particularly bad day, i sent an e-mail to the editor of this blog, asking if the times would be interested in a failing business -- and offering to document what i expected would be our company's imminent demise.
document.title: what i've learned from blogging
lines_and_colors: after a particularly bad day, i sent an e-mail to the editor of this blog, asking if the times would be interested in a failing business -- and offering to document what i expected would be our company's imminent demise.
